GSD.description:
ARM: 9214/1: alignment: advance IT state after emulating Thumb instruction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit 05c214703f286006db285078e70cec4416e5bf7b. For more details please see the references link.
